entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
